name: chlej1i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), co(c1, chj, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), co(c1, chj, c2)))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), co(c1, chj, c2)))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)

|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), co(c1, chj, c2)))
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wcel(c0, cch)

|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), co(c1, chj, c2)))
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, chj, c2), co(c1, chj, c2)))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wcel(c2, cch)

comment: Add join to both sides of a Hilbert lattice ordering. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
